column2: Number of stock bought back by the entity at the exercise price or redemption price.

column1: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Shares
column2: Number of shares that have been repurchased and retired during the period.

column1: Stock Repurchased During Period, Shares
column2: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and have not been retired and are not held in treasury. Some state laws may govern the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

column1: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Stock Splits
column2: Number of shares issued during the period as a result of a stock split.

column1: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Employee Stock Ownership Plan
column2: Number of shares of capital stock issued (purchased by employees) in connection with an employee stock ownership plan.

column1: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Reverse Stock Splits
column2: Reduction in the number of shares during the period as a result of a reverse stock split.

column1: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Restricted Stock Award, Forfeited
column2: Number of shares related to Restricted Stock Award forfeited during the period.

column1: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Employee Stock Purchase Plans
column2: Number of shares issued during the period as a result of an employee stock purchase plan.

column1: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Stock Dividend
column2: Value of stock issued to shareholders as a dividend during the period.

column1: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Employee Stock Purchase Plan
column2: Aggregate change in value for stock issued during the period as a result of employee stock purchase plan.

column1: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Restricted Stock Award, Forfeitures
column2: Value of stock related to Restricted Stock Awards forfeited during the period.

column1: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Restricted Stock Award, Gross
column2: Total number of shares issued during the period, including shares forfeited, as a result of Restricted Stock Awards.

column1: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, New Issues
column2: Number of new stock issued during the period.

column1: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Dividend Reinvestment Plan
column2: Value of stock issued during the period from a dividend reinvestment plan (DRIP). A dividend reinvestment plan allows the holder of the stock to reinvest dividends paid to them by the entity on new issues of stock by the entity.

column1: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Acquisitions
column2: Value of stock issued pursuant to acquisitions during the period.

column1: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period
column2: Number of share options (or share units) exercised during the current period.

column1: Stock and Warrants Issued During Period, Value, Preferred Stock and Warrants
column2: Value of preferred stock and warrants for common stock issued.

column1: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Dividend Reinvestment Plan
column2: Number of shares issued during the period from a dividend reinvestment plan (DRIP). A dividend reinvestment plan allows the shareholders to reinvest dividends paid to them by the entity on new issues of stock by the entity.

column1: Subsidiary of Limited Liability Company or Limited Partnership, Ownership Interest
column2: The number of units or percentage investment held in the subsidiary by the limited liability company or limited partnership.

column1: Trading Securities, Unrealized Holding Gain
column2: Amount of unrealized holding gain before loss recognized in the income statement for investments in trading securities.

column1: Trading Securities, Realized Gain
column2: This item represents the gain realized during the period from the sale of trading securities.

column1: Trading Securities, Realized Loss
column2: This item represents the loss realized during the period from the sale of trading securities.

column1: Trading Securities, Restricted
column2: Total of all securities that are purchased with the intent to be sold in the short-term and that are pledged to one or more secured parties who have the right to buy, sell, or re-pledge the collateral.

column1: Trading Securities, Unrealized Holding Loss
column2: Amount of unrealized holding loss before gain recognized in the income statement for investments in trading securities.

column1: Treasury Stock, Retired, Par Value Method, Amount
column2: Amount of decrease of par value, additional paid in capital (APIC) and retained earnings of common and preferred stock retired from treasury when treasury stock is accounted for under the par value method.

column1: Treasury Stock, Shares, Acquired
column2: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and are being held in treasury.

column1: Treasury Stock, Retired, Cost Method, Amount
column2: Amount of decrease of par value, additional paid in capital (APIC) and retained earnings of common and preferred stock retired from treasury when treasury stock is accounted for under the cost method.

column1: Treasury Stock, Shares, Retired
column2: Number of shares of common and preferred stock retired from treasury during the period.

column1: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
column2: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

column1: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation
column2: Amount of the unrecorded obligation to transfer funds in the future for fixed or minimum amounts or quantities of goods or services at fixed or minimum prices (for example, as in take-or-pay contracts or throughput contracts).

column1: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Imputed Interest
column2: If disclosed, the amount of imputed interest necessary to reduce an unconditional purchase obligation to present value on an unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation.

column1: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Due in Next Twelve Months
column2: Amount of the fixed and determinable portion of the unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

column1: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Due within Four Years
column2: Amount of the fixed and determinable portion of the unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

column1: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Due within Five Years
column2: Amount of the fixed and determinable portion of the unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

column1: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Purchases
column2: The amount purchased during the period under an unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation (for example, under the take-or-pay or throughput contract).

column1: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Due within Three Years
column2: Amount of the fixed and determinable portion of the unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

column1: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Due within Two Years
column2: Amount of the fixed and determinable portion of the unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

column1: Variable Interest Entity, Qualitative or Quantitative Information, Ownership Percentage
column2: Percentage of the Variable Interest Entity's (VIE) voting interest owned by (or beneficial interest in) the reporting entity (directly or indirectly).

column1: Weighted Average Number of Shares, Restricted Stock
column2: Number of shares of restricted stock determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that restricted shares have been outstanding to the total time in that period. Restricted shares are subject to sales, contractual, regulatory or other restrictions that prevent or inhibit the holder from freely disposing of them before the restriction ends.

column1: Beneficial Interest, Secured by Prepayable Financial Instruments, Last-of-Layer, Amortized Cost
column2: Amortized cost of beneficial interest secured by prepayable financial instrument, used to designate hedging relationship in which hedged item is last layer expected to be remaining at end of hedging relationship.

column1: Capitalized Contract Cost, Net, Current
column2: Amount, after accumulated amortization and accumulated impairment loss, of asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer; classified as current.

column1: Capitalized Contract Cost, Net, Noncurrent
column2: Amount, after accumulated amortization and accumulated impairment loss, of asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer; classified as noncurrent.

column1: Continuing Care Retirement Communities, Obligation for Future Service, Amount
column2: Present value of liability to provide future service and use of facility related to continuing-care contract.

column1: Continuing Care Retirement Communities, Obligation for Future Service, Interest Rate
column2: Interest rate used to discount liability to provide future service related to continuing-care contract.

column1: Common Stock, Convertible, Conversion Price, Increase
column2: Per share increase in conversion price of convertible common stock. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

column1: Common Stock, Convertible, Conversion Price, Increase
column2: Per share increase in conversion price of convertible common stock. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

column1: Closed Portfolio and Beneficial Interest, Last-of-Layer, Amortized Cost
column2: Amortized cost of closed portfolio of prepayable financial asset and beneficial interest secured by prepayable financial instrument, used to designate hedging relationship in which hedged item is last layer expected to be remaining at end of hedging relationship.

column1: Compensation Expense, Excluding Cost of Good and Service Sold
column2: Amount of expense for salary, wage, profit sharing; incentive and equity-based compensation; and other employee benefit. Other employee benefit expense includes, but is not limited to, service component of net periodic benefit cost for defined benefit plan. Excludes compensation cost in cost of good and service sold.

column1: Compensation Expense, Excluding Cost of Good and Service Sold
column2: Amount of expense for salary, wage, profit sharing; incentive and equity-based compensation; and other employee benefit. Other employee benefit expense includes, but is not limited to, service component of net periodic benefit cost for defined benefit plan. Excludes compensation cost in cost of good and service sold.

column1: Cost, Depletion
column2: Cost of reduction in quantity of natural resource due to consumption directly related to good produced and service rendered.

column1: Cost, Maintenance
column2: Cost of maintenance incurred and directly related to good produced and service rendered.

column1: Cost, Direct Material
column2: Cost of material used for good produced and service rendered.

column1: Cost, Direct Labor
column2: Cost of labor directly related to good produced and service rendered. Includes, but is not limited to, payroll cost and equity-based compensation.

column1: Cost, Depreciation, Amortization and Depletion
column2: Amount of expense for allocation of cost of tangible and intangible assets over their useful lives, and reduction in quantity of natural resource due to consumption directly used in production of good and rendering of service.

column1: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than 12 Months, Accumulated Loss
column2: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for less than 12 months.

column1: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Derivative, Cumulative Loss
column2: Amount of loss in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for derivative hedging forecasted acquisition of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

column1: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Derivative, Cumulative Gain
column2: Amount of gain in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for derivative hedging forecasted acquisition of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

column1: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Transfer, Amount
column2: Amount of investment in debt security, measured at amortized cost, transferred to investment in debt security, measured at fair value, with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and net income (trading).

column1: Debt Securities, Trading and Available-for-sale
column2: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

column1: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale and Held-to-maturity
column2: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

column1: Debt Securities, Trading, and Equity Securities, FV-NI, Cost
column2: Cost of investment in debt investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading) and investment in equity security with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI). Excludes equity method investment and investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

column1: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Unrealized Loss Position, Number of Positions
column2: Number of investments in debt securities measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in unrealized loss position.

column1: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Unrealized Loss Position
column2: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in unrealized loss position.

column1: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Unrealized Loss Position, Accumulated Loss
column2: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in unrealized loss position.

column1: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, 12 Months or Longer, Number of Positions
column2: Number of investments in debt securities measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for 12 months or longer.

column1: Debt Securities, Trading, Realized Gain
column2: Amount of realized gain on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

column1: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Realized Loss, Excluding Other-than-temporary Impairment
column2: Amount of realized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), excluding other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

column1: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Restricted
column2: Amount of restricted investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

column1: Debt Securities
column2: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

column1: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Sold, Amount
column2: Amount of investment in debt security, measured at amortized cost, sold.

column1: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, 12 Months or Longer, Accumulated Loss
column2: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for 12 months or longer.

column1: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than 12 Months
column2: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for less than 12 months.

column1: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than 12 Months, Number of Positions
column2: Number of investments in debt securities measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for less than 12 months.

column1: Debt Securities, Trading, Unrealized Loss
column2: Amount of unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

column1: Debt Instrument, Convertible, Conversion Price, Decrease
column2: Per share decrease in conversion price of debt instrument. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

column1: Debt Securities, Trading, Realized Loss
column2: Amount of realized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

column1: Debt Securities, Current
column2: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading); classified as current.

column1: Debt Securities, Trading, Unrealized Loss
column2: Amount of unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

column1: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Realized Gain
column2: Amount of realized gain on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

column1: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Transfer to Trading, Gain
column2: Amount of unrealized gain recognized in earnings from transfer of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

column1: Debt Securities, Noncurrent
column2: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), classified as noncurrent.

column1: Debt Securities, Trading, Restricted
column2: Amount of restricted investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

column1: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Transfer to Trading, Loss
column2: Amount of unrealized loss recognized in earnings from transfer of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

column1: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, 12 Months or Longer
column2: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for more than 12 months.

column1: Debt Instrument, Convertible, Conversion Price, Increase
column2: Per share increase in conversion price of debt instrument. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

column1: Defined Benefit Plan, Pension Plan with Projected Benefit Obligation in Excess of Plan Assets, Plan Assets
column2: Amount of plan asset for defined benefit pension plan with projected benefit obligation in excess of plan assets.

column1: Defined Benefit Plan, Pension Plan with Projected Benefit Obligation in Excess of Plan Assets, Accumulated Benefit Obligation
column2: Amount of accumulated benefit obligation for defined benefit pension plan with projected benefit obligation in excess of plan assets.

column1: Defined Benefit Plan, Pension Plan with Projected Benefit Obligation in Excess of Plan Assets, Projected Benefit Obligation
column2: Amount of projected benefit obligation for defined benefit pension plan with projected benefit obligation in excess of plan assets.

column1: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Investment within Plan Asset Category, Amount
column2: Amount of investment within defined benefit plan asset category.

column1: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Investment within Plan Asset Category, Percentage
column2: Percentage of investment to total investment within defined benefit plan asset category.

column1: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets Level 3 Reconciliation, Decrease for Sale
column2: Amount, measured using unobservable input, of decrease in plan asset of defined benefit plan from sale.

column1: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets Level 3 Reconciliation, Decrease for Settlement
column2: Amount, measured using unobservable input, of decrease in plan asset of defined benefit plan from settlement of trade associated with underlying investment.

column1: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets Level 3 Reconciliation, Increase for Purchase
column2: Amount, measured using unobservable input, of increase in plan asset of defined benefit plan from purchase.

column1: Derivative, Excluded Component, Gain, Recognized in Earnings
column2: Amount of gain from excluded component of derivative hedge, recognized in earnings. Excludes recognition under systematic and rational method.

column1: Derivative, Excluded Component, Loss, Recognized in Earnings
column2: Amount of loss from excluded component of derivative hedge, recognized in earnings. Excludes recognition under systematic and rational method.

column1: Dividend Income, Equity Securities, Operating
column2: Amount of dividend income on investment in equity security, classified as operating.

column1: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Share-based Compensation, Excess Tax Benefit, Amount
column2: Amount of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operation, attributable to excess tax benefit for share-based compensation cost.

column1: Equity Securities, FV-NI
column2: Amount of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

column1: Equity Securities, FV-NI and without Readily Determinable Fair Value
column2: Amount of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI) and investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

column1: Equity Securities, FV-NI, Cost
column2: Cost of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI). Excludes equity method investment and investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

column1: Equity Securities, FV-NI, Realized Gain
column2: Amount of realized gain from sale of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

column1: Equity Securities, FV-NI, Realized Loss
column2: Amount of realized loss from sale of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

column1: Equity Securities, FV-NI, Restricted
column2: Amount of restricted investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

column1: Equity Securities, FV-NI, Unrealized Gain
column2: Amount of unrealized gain on investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

column1: Equity Securities, FV-NI, Unrealized Loss
column2: Amount of unrealized loss on investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

column1: Equity Securities without Readily Determinable Fair Value, Amount
column2: Amount of investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

column1: Equity Securities without Readily Determinable Fair Value, Downward Price Adjustment, Annual Amount
column2: Amount of loss from downward price adjustment on investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

column1: Equity Securities without Readily Determinable Fair Value, Downward Price Adjustment, Cumulative Amount
column2: Amount of cumulative loss from downward price adjustment on investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

column1: Equity Securities without Readily Determinable Fair Value, Impairment Loss, Cumulative Amount
column2: Amount of cumulative impairment loss on investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

column1: Equity Securities without Readily Determinable Fair Value, Upward Price Adjustment, Annual Amount
column2: Amount of gain from upward price adjustment on investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

column1: Equity Securities without Readily Determinable Fair Value, Upward Price Adjustment, Cumulative Amount
column2: Amount of cumulative gain from upward price adjustment on investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

column1: Financial Instrument Subject to Mandatory Redemption, Par Value Per Share
column2: Par value per share of mandatory redeemable financial instrument classified as liability.

column1: Health Care Organization, Accounts Receivable Due from Third-Party Payor, Retroactive Adjustment
column2: Amount of receivable from retroactive adjustment for final settlement or appeal due from third-party payor.

column1: Hedged Asset, Fair Value Hedge
column2: Amount of asset hedged in fair value hedging relationship.

column1: Hedged Asset, Fair Value Hedge, Last-of-Layer, Amount
column2: Amount of asset hedged in last of layer, expected to be remaining at end of hedging relationship.

column1: Hedged Liability, Fair Value Hedge
column2: Amount of liability hedged in fair value hedging relationship.

column1: Interest Income, Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Operating
column2: Amount of interest income, amortization of premium and accretion of discount on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale); classified as operating.

column1: Interest Income, Debt Securities, Operating
column2: Amount of interest income, amortization of premium and accretion of discount, on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading); classified as operating.

column1: Interest Income, Debt Securities, Trading, Operating
column2: Amount of interest income, amortization of premium and accretion of discount, on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading); classified as operating.

column1: Merchant Marine, Operating-differential Subsidy
column2: Amount of operating-differential subsidy received pursuant to Merchant Marine Act of 1936.

column1: Preferred Stock, Convertible, Conversion Price, Decrease
column2: Per share decrease in conversion price of convertible preferred stock. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

column1: Preferred Stock, Convertible, Conversion Price, Increase
column2: Per share increase in conversion price of convertible preferred stock. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

column1: Prepayable Financial Asset Closed Portfolio, Last-of-Layer, Amortized Cost
column2: Amortized cost of closed portfolio of prepayable financial asset, used to designate hedging relationship in which hedged item is last layer expected to be remaining at end of hedging relationship.

column1: Reserve Quantity Attributable to Consolidated Subsidiary, Noncontrolling Interest, Volume
column2: Volume of reserve quantity of oil and gas attributable to consolidated subsidiary with noncontrolling interest.

column1: Short-duration Insurance Contract, Discounted Liability, Discount for Reinsurance
column2: Amount of cumulative discount for reinsurance related to time value of money deducted from short-duration insurance contract liability reported at present value.

column1: Short-duration Insurance Contract, Discounted Liability, Discount for Reinsurance
column2: Amount of cumulative discount for reinsurance related to time value of money deducted from short-duration insurance contract liability reported at present value.

column1: Short-duration Insurance Contract, Discounted Liability, Discount, Net of Reinsurance
column2: Amount of cumulative discount, after effect of reinsurance, related to time value of money deducted from short-duration insurance contract liability reported at present value.

column1: Stock Option, Exercise Price, Decrease
column2: Per share decrease in exercise price of stock option. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision and stock option granted for share-based compensation.

column1: Stock Option, Exercise Price, Increase
column2: Per share increase in exercise price of stock option. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision and stock option granted for share-based compensation.

column1: Warrant, Exercise Price, Decrease
column2: Per share decrease in exercise price of warrant. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

column1: Warrant, Exercise Price, Increase
column2: Per share increase in exercise price of warrant. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

column1: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserves, Production
column2: Production of proved reserves.

column1: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserves, Sales of Minerals in Place
column2: Sales of minerals in place.

column1: SEC Schedule III, Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Amount of Encumbrances
column2: Amount of lien or mortgage outstanding on real estate investment properties for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

column1: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserve, Production (Energy)
column2: Energy measure of decrease in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas resulting from production, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

column1: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserves, Sale of Mineral in Place (Energy)
column2: Energy measure of decrease in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas resulting from sale of mineral in place, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

column1: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserves, Extensions, Discoveries, and Additions
column2: Additions to proved reserves that result from (1) extension of the proved acreage of previously discovered (old) reservoirs through additional drilling in periods after discovery and (2) discovery of new fields with proved reserves or of new reservoirs of proved reserves in old fields.

column1: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserves, Purchases of Minerals in Place
column2: Purchase of minerals in place.

column1: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserves, Net
column2: The net quantity of proved reserves as of the balance sheet date. Proved oil reserves are the estimated quantities of crude oil and natural gas liquids which geological and engineering data demonstrate with reasonable certainty to be recoverable.

column1: Proved Developed Reserves (Volume)
column2: Net quantities of an enterprise's interests in proved developed reserves of either crude oil (including condensate and natural gas liquids), natural gas, synthetic oil and gas, or other nonrenewable natural resource that is intended to be upgraded into synthetic oil and gas as of the beginning and the end of the year. "Net" quantities of reserves include those relating to the enterprise's operating and nonoperating interests in properties. Quantities of reserves relating to royalty interests owned are included in "net" quantities if the necessary information is available to the enterprise. "Net" quantities does not include reserves relating to interests of others in properties owned by the enterprise. The unit of measure for reserve quantities is defined as "barrels" for oil and synthetic oil reserves or "cubic feet" or "cubic meters" for natural gas and synthetic gas reserves.

column1: Proved Undeveloped Reserve (Volume)
column2: Net quantities of an enterprise's interests in proved undeveloped reserves of either crude oil (including condensate and natural gas liquids), natural gas, synthetic oil and gas, or other renewable natural resource that is intended to be upgraded into synthetic oil and gas as of the beginning and the end of the year. "Net" quantities of reserves include those relating to the enterprise's operating and nonoperating interests in properties. Quantities of reserves relating to royalty interests owned are included in "net" quantities if the necessary information is available to the enterprise. "Net" quantities does not include reserves relating to interests of others in properties owned by the enterprise. The unit of measure for reserve quantities is defined as "barrels" for oil and synthetic oil reserves or "cubic feet" or "cubic meters" for natural gas and synthetic gas reserves.

column1: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserves, Improved Recovery
column2: Changes in proved reserve estimates resulting from application of improved recovery techniques.

column1: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Production Costs
column2: Amount of estimated future accumulated cash outflow for costs to be incurred in producing proved oil and gas reserves.

column1: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Development Costs
column2: Amount of estimated future accumulated cash outflow for costs to be incurred in developing proved oil and gas reserves.

column1: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Periodic Payment Terms, Balloon Payment to be Received
column2: Amount of large payment to be received at final maturity date of mortgage loans.

column1: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Cash Inflows
column2: Amount of estimated future accumulated cash inflow from the sale of proved oil and gas reserves.

column1: Life Insurance in Force, Assumed
column2: Amount of life insurance issued and outstanding assumed from other entities. Includes, but not limited to, dividends and adjustments to face value.

column1: Life Insurance in Force, Ceded
column2: Amount of life insurance issued and outstanding ceded to other entities. Includes, but not limited to, dividends and adjustments to face value.

column1: Life Insurance in Force, Gross
column2: Amount before contracts ceded to other entities and contracts assumed by the entity of life insurance issued and outstanding. Includes, but not limited to, dividends and adjustments to face value.

column1: Life Insurance in Force, Net
column2: Amount after contracts ceded to other entities and contracts assumed by the entity of life insurance issued and outstanding. Includes, but not limited to, dividends and adjustments to face value.

column1: Life Insurance in Force, Percentage Assumed to Net
column2: Percentage of assumed life insurance issued and outstanding contracts to life insurance issued and outstanding after contracts ceded to other entities and contracts assumed by the entity. Includes, but not limited to, dividends and adjustments to face value.

column1: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Delinquent Principal or Interest, Acquired from Affiliates
column2: Amount of principal due on loans that have been delinquent, which may exclude loans having interest delinquent for three months or less, as of the balance sheet date that were acquired from controlled and other affiliates.

column1: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Face Amount of Mortgages
column2: Amount of the contractual principal due at the origination of the mortgage loan (face amount).

column1: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Federal Income Tax Basis
column2: Amount of the federal income tax basis of mortgage loans on real estate.

column1: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Interest Rate
column2: The stated interest rate on the mortgage loan receivable or the weighted average interest rate on a group of loans.

column1: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Number of Loans
column2: Indicates the number of mortgages under each classification.

column1: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Principal Amount of Delinquent Loans
column2: Amount of principal due on loans that have been delinquent, which may exclude loans having interest delinquent for three months or less, as of the balance sheet date.

column1: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Prior Liens
column2: Amount of prior lien on the real estate that secures the mortgage loan.

column1: Oil and Gas Quantities Received under Long-term Supply Agreements with Governments or Authorities
column2: The net quantity of oil and/or gas received under long-term supply, purchase, or similar agreements and contracts, including such agreements with governments or authorities, as of the end of the period if the enterprise participates in the operation of the properties in which the oil or gas is located or otherwise serves as the "producer" of those reserves, as opposed, for example, to being an independent purchaser, broker, dealer or importer.

column1: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserve, Extension and Discovery (Energy)
column2: Energy measure of increase in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas resulting from the extension of the proved acreage of previously discovered reservoir or discovery of new field with proved reserve or of new reservoir of proved reserve in old field, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

column1: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserve, Improved Recovery (Energy)
column2: Energy measure of increase in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas resulting from application of improved recovery techniques, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

column1: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserve, Net (Energy)
column2: Energy measure of proved reserve of oil and gas, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

column1: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserve, Purchase of Mineral in Place (Energy)
column2: Energy measure of increase in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas resulting from purchase of mineral in place, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

column1: Proved Developed Reserves (Energy)
column2: Energy measure of interests in proved developed reserves of crude oil, including condensate and natural gas liquids, natural gas, synthetic oil and gas, or other nonrenewable natural resource that is intended to be upgraded into synthetic oil and gas.

column1: Proved Undeveloped Reserves (Energy)
column2: Energy measure of proved undeveloped reserves of crude oil, including condensate and natural gas liquids, natural gas, synthetic oil and gas, or other nonrenewable natural resource that is intended to be upgraded into synthetic oil and gas.

column1: Reserves, Share of Equity Method Investee's Net Proved Oil and Gas Reserves
column2: The proportional interest of net proved oil reserve quantities of equity investees.

column1: SEC Schedule III, Real Estate, Number of Units
column2: Number of units of real estate held for investment for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

column1: Previously Estimated Development Costs Incurred
column2: Amount of increase in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of previously estimated development costs incurred.

column1: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Collections of Principal
column2: The amount of principal collected on mortgage loans on real estate during the reporting period.

column1: Decrease Due to Sales of Minerals in Place
column2: Amount of decrease in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of sales of minerals in place.

column1: Standardized Measure of Discounted Future Net Cash Flow Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Accretion of Discount
column2: Amount of accretion of discount for the standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow related to proved oil and gas reserves.

column1: Proved Oil and Gas Reserve Quantities Applicable to Long-term Supply Agreements with Governments or Authorities
column2: Reserve quantities of oil and/or gas subject to purchase under long-term supply, purchase, or similar agreements and contracts with governments or authorities, as of the end of the period if the enterprise participates in the operation of the properties in which the oil or gas is located or otherwise serves as the producer of those reserves, as opposed, for example, to being an independent purchaser, broker, dealer or importer.

column1: Increase Due to Purchases of Minerals in Place
column2: Amount of increase in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of purchases of minerals in place.

column1: Standardized Measure of Discounted Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves
column2: Amount of discounted future accumulated cash inflow relating to proved oil and gas reserves.

column1: Extensions, Discoveries, Additions and Improved Recovery, Less Related Costs
column2: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of extensions, discoveries and improved recovery of proved oil and gas reserves.

column1: SEC Schedule III, Real Estate, Federal Income Tax Basis
column2: Cost basis of real estate investments for federal income tax purposes for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

column1: Earnings Per Share, Basic, Distributed
column2: Dividends declared in the period and the contractual amount of dividends (or interest on participating income bonds) that must be paid per security.

column1: Accounts and Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss
column2: Amount of allowance for credit loss of accounts and financing receivables. Includes, but is not limited to, notes and loan receivable.

column1: Accounts Receivable, Noncurrent, 90 Days or More Past Due, Still Accruing
column2: Amount of accounts receivable, classified as noncurrent, 90 days or more past due and still accruing.

column1: Accounts Receivable, Noncurrent, Nonaccrual
column2: Amount of accounts receivable, classified as noncurrent, on nonaccrual status.

column1: Accounts Receivable, Noncurrent, Nonaccrual, Interest Income
column2: Amount of interest income on accounts receivable, classified as noncurrent, on nonaccrual status.

column1: Accounts Receivable, Noncurrent, Nonaccrual, No Allowance
column2: Amount of accounts receivable, classified as noncurrent, on nonaccrual status with no allowance for credit loss.

column1: Accounts Receivable, Noncurrent, Not Past Due
column2: Amount of accounts receivable not past due, classified as noncurrent.

column1: Accounts Receivable, Noncurrent, Originated Five or More Years before Latest Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of accounts receivable originated five or more years prior to latest fiscal year, classified as noncurrent.

column1: Accounts Receivable, Noncurrent, Originated Four Years before Latest Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of accounts receivable originated four years prior to latest fiscal year, classified as noncurrent.

column1: Accounts Receivable, Noncurrent, Originated in Current Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of accounts receivable originated in current fiscal year, classified as noncurrent.

column1: Accounts Receivable, Noncurrent, Originated in Fiscal Year before Latest Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of accounts receivable originated in fiscal year prior to latest fiscal year, classified as noncurrent.

column1: Accounts Receivable, Noncurrent, Originated Three Years before Latest Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of accounts receivable originated three years prior to latest fiscal year, classified as noncurrent.

column1: Accounts Receivable, Noncurrent, Originated Two Years before Latest Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of accounts receivable originated two years prior to latest fiscal year, classified as noncurrent.

column1: Accounts Receivable, Noncurrent, Past Due
column2: Amount of accounts receivable past due, classified as noncurrent.

column1: Accounts Receivable, Purchase
column2: Amount of increase from purchase of accounts receivable.

column1: Accounts Receivable, Sale
column2: Amount of decrease from sale of accounts receivable.

column1: Additional Liability, Long-Duration Insurance, after Reinsurance
column2: Amount, after effect of reinsurance, of present value of total expected payment to policyholder in excess of present value of total expected assessment. Excludes benefit classified as market risk benefit or under provisions of Topic 815 on derivative and hedging.

column1: Additional Liability, Long-Duration Insurance, before Reinsurance, after Discount Rate Change
column2: Amount, before effect of reinsurance and after current period update of cash flow assumption and discount rate change, of present value of total expected payment to policyholder in excess of present value of total expected assessment. Excludes benefit classified as market risk benefit or under provisions of Topic 815 on derivative and hedging.

column1: Additional Liability, Long-Duration Insurance, Benefit Payment
column2: Amount of cash outflow to policyholder related to benefit payment for present value of total expected payment to policyholder in excess of present value of total expected assessment. Excludes benefit classified as market risk benefit or under provisions of Topic 815 on derivative and hedging.

column1: Additional Liability, Long-Duration Insurance, Current Weighted-Average Discount Rate
column2: Current weighted-average discount rate used to measure present value of total expected payment to policyholder in excess of present value of total expected assessment. Excludes benefit classified as market risk benefit or under provisions of Topic 815 on derivative and hedging.

column1: Additional Liability, Long-Duration Insurance, Derecognition
column2: Amount of decrease in present value of total expected payment to policyholder in excess of present value of total expected assessment from derecognition of contract. Excludes benefit classified as market risk benefit or under provisions of Topic 815 on derivative and hedging.

column1: Additional Liability, Long-Duration Insurance, Gross Premium Income
column2: Amount of gross premium income recognized for present value of total expected payment to policyholder in excess of present value of total expected assessment. Excludes benefit classified as market risk benefit or under provisions of Topic 815 on derivative and hedging.

column1: Additional Liability, Long-Duration Insurance, Issuance
column2: Amount of increase in present value of total expected payment to policyholder in excess of present value of total expected assessment from contract issuance. Excludes benefit classified as market risk benefit or under provisions of Topic 815 on derivative and hedging.

column1: Additional Liability, Long-Duration Insurance, Net Premium Collected
column2: Amount of gross premium collected from policyholder to fund expected benefit payment for present value of total expected payment to policyholder in excess of present value of total expected assessment. Excludes benefit classified as market risk benefit or under provisions of Topic 815 on derivative and hedging.

column1: Additional Liability, Long-Duration Insurance, Original Discount Rate, before Cash Flow and Reinsurance
column2: Amount, before effect of reinsurance and current period update of cash flow assumption, of present value of total expected payment to policyholder in excess of present value of total expected assessment, discounted at original rate. Excludes benefit classified as market risk benefit or under provisions of Topic 815 on derivative and hedging.

column1: Additional Liability, Long-Duration Insurance, Original Discount Rate, before Reinsurance, after Cash Flow Change
column2: Amount, before effect of reinsurance and after current period update of cash flow assumption, of present value of total expected payment to policyholder in excess of present value of total expected assessment, discounted at original rate. Excludes benefit classified as market risk benefit or under provisions of Topic 815 on derivative and hedging.

column1: Additional Liability, Long-Duration Insurance, Reinsurance Recoverable, after Allowance
column2: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, recoverable under reinsurance for present value of total expected payment to policyholder in excess of present value of total expected assessment. Excludes benefit classified as market risk benefit or under provisions of Topic 815 on derivative and hedging.

column1: Additional Liability, Long-Duration Insurance, Weighted-Average Interest Accretion Rate
column2: Original weighted-average discount rate at contract issue date used to measure present value of total expected payment to policyholder in excess of present value of total expected assessment. Excludes benefit classified as market risk benefit or under provisions of Topic 815 on derivative and hedging.

column1: Contract with Customer, Asset, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
column2: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, from recovery.

column1: Contract with Customer, Asset, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff
column2: Amount of writeoff of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, charged against allowance for credit loss.

column1: Contract with Customer, Asset, Not Past Due
column2: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, not past due.

column1: Contract with Customer, Asset, Past Due
column2: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, past due.

column1: Contract with Customer, Asset, Purchase
column2: Amount of increase from purchase of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on passage of time.

column1: Contract with Customer, Asset, Sale
column2: Amount of decrease from sale of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time and other income.

column1: Cost of Goods and Service, Excluding Depreciation, Depletion, and Amortization
column2: Cost of product sold and service rendered, excluding depreciation, depletion, and amortization.

column1: Deferred Income
column2: Amount of deferred income excluding obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

column1: Deferred Income, Current
column2: Amount of deferred income excluding obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as current.

column1: Deferred Income, Noncurrent
column2: Amount of deferred income excluding obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as noncurrent.

column1: Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost and Present Value of Future Insurance Profit, Experience Adjustment
column2: Amount of expense for writeoff from unexpected insurance contract termination, charged against previously capitalized amount in deferred policy acquisition cost and present value of future profit from insurance contract acquired in business combination.

column1: Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost, Experience Adjustment
column2: Amount of expense for writeoff from unexpected insurance contract termination, charged against previously capitalized deferred policy acquisition cost.

column1: Deferred Sale Inducement Cost, Experience Adjustment
column2: Amount of expense for writeoff from unexpected insurance contract termination, charged against previously capitalized deferred sale inducement cost.

column1: Deferred Tax Asset, Interest Carryforward
column2: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible interest carryforward.

column1: Defined Benefit Plan, Assumptions Used Calculating Benefit Obligation, Weighted-Average Interest Crediting Rate
column2: Weighted-average interest crediting rate used to determine benefit obligation of defined benefit plan. Plan includes, but is not limited to, cash balance and other defined benefit plans with promised interest crediting rate.

column1: Defined Benefit Plan, Assumptions Used Calculating Net Periodic Benefit Cost, Weighted-Average Interest Crediting Rate
column2: Weighted-average interest crediting rate used to determine net periodic benefit cost of defined benefit plan. Plan includes, but is not limited to, cash balance and other defined benefit plans with promised interest crediting rate.

column1: Derivative, Nonmonetary Notional Amount
column2: Nominal number of units used to calculate payment on derivative.

column1: Derivative, Notional Amount
column2: Nominal or face amount used to calculate payment on derivative.

column1: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, 90 Days or More Past Due, Still Accruing
column2: Amount of net investment in direct financing lease, 90 days or more past due and still accruing.

column1: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss
column2: Amount of allowance for credit loss on net investment in direct financing lease.

column1: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
column2: Amount of allowance for credit loss on net investment in direct financing lease, classified as current.

column1: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
column2: Amount of allowance for credit loss on net investment in direct financing lease, classified as noncurrent.

column1: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
column2: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on net investment in direct financing lease, from recovery.

column1: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff
column2: Amount of writeoff of net investment in direct financing lease, charged against allowance for credit loss.

column1: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Change in Present Value, Interest Income
column2: Amount of interest income on net investment in direct financing lease, from change in present value of expected cash flows, attributable to passage of time.

column1: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Nonaccrual
column2: Amount of net investment in direct financing lease on nonaccrual status.

column1: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Nonaccrual, Interest Income
column2: Amount of interest income on net investment in direct financing lease, on nonaccrual status.

column1: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Nonaccrual, No Allowance
column2: Amount of net investment in direct financing lease on nonaccrual status with no allowance for credit loss.

column1: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Not Past Due
column2: Amount of net investment in direct financing lease, not past due.

column1: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Originated Five or More Years before Latest Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of net investment in direct financing lease originated five or more years prior to latest fiscal year.

column1: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Originated Four Years before Latest Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of net investment in direct financing lease originated four years prior to latest fiscal year.

column1: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Originated in Current Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of net investment in direct financing lease originated in current fiscal year.

column1: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Originated in Fiscal Year before Latest Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of net investment in direct financing lease originated in fiscal year prior to latest fiscal year.

column1: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Originated Three Years before Latest Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of net investment in direct financing lease originated three years prior to latest fiscal year.

column1: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Originated Two Years before Latest Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of net investment in direct financing lease originated two years prior to latest fiscal year.

column1: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Past Due
column2: Amount of net investment in direct financing lease, past due.

column1: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Purchase
column2: Amount of increase from purchase of net investment in direct financing lease.

column1: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Sale
column2: Amount of decrease from sale of net investment in direct financing lease.

column1: Financing Receivable, after Deferred Income Offset
column2: Amount, after fee received for commitment to originate or purchase, of financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

column1: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Purchased with Credit Deterioration, Increase
column2: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on financing receivable purchased with credit deterioration.

column1: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff, after Recovery
column2: Amount, after recovery, of writeoff of financing receivable, charged against allowance for credit loss.

column1: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss and Fee
column2: Amount, before allowance for credit loss and fee, of financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

column1: Financing Receivable, Change in Present Value, Interest Income
column2: Amount of interest income on financing receivable, from change in present value of expected cash flows, attributable to passage of time.

column1: Financing Receivable, Covered and Not Covered, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Fee, Premium, and Discount
column2: Amount, after allowance for credit loss and unamortized deferred fee, premium, and discount, of financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement and financing receivable not covered under loss sharing agreement.

column1: Financing Receivable, Covered, after Allowance for Credit Loss
column2: Amount, after allowance, of finance receivable covered by loss sharing agreement.

column1: Financing Receivable, Covered, Allowance for Credit Loss
column2: Amount of allowance for finance receivable covered by loss sharing agreement.

column1: Financing Receivable, Covered, before Allowance for Credit Loss
column2: Amount, before allowance, of finance receivable covered by loss sharing agreement.

column1: Financing Receivable, Deferred Income
column2: Amount of fee received for commitment to originate or purchase financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

column1: Financing Receivable, Loan in Process
column2: Amount of undisbursed portion of financing receivable balance. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

column1: Financing Receivable, Nonaccrual, Interest Income
column2: Amount of interest income on financing receivable on nonaccrual status.

column1: Financing Receivable, Nonaccrual, No Allowance
column2: Amount of financing receivable on nonaccrual status with no allowance for credit loss.

column1: Financing Receivable, Originated Five or More Years before Latest Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of financing receivable originated five or more years prior to latest fiscal year.

column1: Financing Receivable, Originated Four Years before Latest Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of financing receivable originated four years prior to latest fiscal year.

column1: Financing Receivable, Originated in Current Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of financing receivable originated in current fiscal year.

column1: Financing Receivable, Originated in Fiscal Year before Latest Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of financing receivable originated in fiscal year prior to latest fiscal year.

column1: Financing Receivable, Originated Three Years before Latest Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of financing receivable originated three years prior to latest fiscal year.

column1: Financing Receivable, Originated Two Years before Latest Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of financing receivable originated two years prior to latest fiscal year.

column1: Financing Receivable, Purchased with Credit Deterioration, Allowance for Credit Loss at Acquisition Date
column2: Amount of allowance for credit loss at acquisition date of financing receivable purchased with credit deterioration.

column1: Financing Receivable, Purchased with Credit Deterioration, Amount at Par Value
column2: Amount at par value of financing receivable purchased with credit deterioration.

column1: Financing Receivable, Purchased with Credit Deterioration, Amount at Purchase Price
column2: Amount at purchase price of financing receivable purchased with credit deterioration.

column1: Financing Receivable, Revolving
column2: Amount of financing receivable that can be withdrawn, repaid and redrawn.

column1: Hosting Arrangement, Service Contract, Implementation Cost, Capitalized, Accumulated Amortization
column2: Amount of accumulated amortization of capitalized implementation cost from hosting arrangement that is service contract.

column1: Hosting Arrangement, Service Contract, Implementation Cost, Capitalized, after Accumulated Amortization
column2: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of capitalized implementation cost from hosting arrangement that is service contract.

column1: Hosting Arrangement, Service Contract, Implementation Cost, Capitalized, before Accumulated Amortization
column2: Amount, before accumulated amortization, of capitalized implementation cost from hosting arrangement that is service contract.

column1: Hosting Arrangement, Service Contract, Implementation Cost, Expense, Amortization
column2: Amount of amortization expense for capitalized implementation cost from hosting arrangement that is service contract.

column1: Investment Interest Rate
column2: Rate of interest on investment.

column1: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Adverse Development, Expense
column2: Amount of expense for adverse development on liability of future policy benefit from net premium exceeding gross premium.

column1: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, after Reinsurance
column2: Amount, after effect of reinsurance, of liability for future policy benefit.

column1: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Current Weighted-Average Discount Rate
column2: Current weighted-average discount rate used to measure liability for future policy benefit.

column1: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Expected Future Benefit, Original Discount Rate, before Reinsurance, after Cash Flow Change
column2: Amount, before effect of reinsurance and after current period update of cash flow assumption, of expected future benefit and expense component for liability for future policy benefit, discounted at original rate.

column1: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Expected Future Gross Premium, Discounted, before Reinsurance
column2: Amount, before effect of reinsurance, of discounted balance for expected future gross premium component of liability for future policy benefit.

column1: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Expected Future Gross Premium, Undiscounted, before Reinsurance
column2: Amount, before effect of reinsurance, of undiscounted balance for expected future gross premium component of liability for future policy benefit.

column1: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Expected Future Policy Benefit, before Reinsurance, after Discount Rate Change
column2: Amount, before effect of reinsurance and after current period update of cash flow assumption and discount rate change, of expected future policy benefit and expense component of liability for future policy benefit.

column1: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Expected Future Policy Benefit, Derecognition
column2: Amount of decrease in expected future policy benefit and expense component of liability for future policy benefit from derecognition of contract.

column1: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Expected Future Policy Benefit, Interest Expense
column2: Amount of interest expense for expected future policy benefit and expense component of liability for future policy benefit.

column1: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Expected Future Policy Benefit, Issuance
column2: Amount of increase in expected future policy benefit and expense component of liability for future policy benefit from contract issuance.

column1: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Expected Future Policy Benefit, Original Discount Rate, before Cash Flow and Reinsurance
column2: Amount, before effect of reinsurance and current period update of cash flow assumption, of expected future policy benefit and expense component of liability for future policy benefit, discounted at original rate.

column1: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Expected Future Policy Benefit, Undiscounted, before Reinsurance
column2: Amount, before effect of reinsurance, of undiscounted balance for expected future policy benefit and expense component of liability for future policy benefit.

column1: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Expected Net Premium, before Reinsurance, after Discount Rate Change
column2: Amount, before effect of reinsurance and after current period update of cash flow assumption and discount rate change, of expected net premium component of liability for future policy benefit.

column1: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Expected Net Premium, Derecognition
column2: Amount of decrease in expected net premium component of liability for future policy benefit from derecognition of contract.

column1: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Expected Net Premium, Interest Income
column2: Amount of interest income for expected net premium component of liability for future policy benefit.

column1: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Expected Net Premium, Issuance
column2: Amount of increase in expected net premium component of liability for future policy benefit from contract issuance.

column1: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Expected Net Premium, Net Premium Collected
column2: Amount of premium collected from policyholder to fund expected benefit payment for expected net premium component of liability for future policy benefit.

column1: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Expected Net Premium, Original Discount Rate, before Cash Flow and Reinsurance
column2: Amount, before effect of reinsurance and current period update of cash flow assumption, of expected net premium component of liability for future policy benefit, discounted at original rate.

column1: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Expected Net Premium, Original Discount Rate, before Reinsurance, after Cash Flow Change
column2: Amount, before effect of reinsurance and after current period update of cash flow assumption, of expected net premium component for liability for future policy benefit, discounted at original rate.

column1: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Gross Premium Income
column2: Amount of gross premium income recognized for liability for future policy benefit.

column1: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Interest Expense
column2: Amount of interest expense recognized for liability for future policy benefit.

column1: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Reinsurance Recoverable, after Allowance
column2: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, recoverable under reinsurance of liability for future policy benefit.

column1: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Weighted-Average Interest Accretion Rate
column2: Original weighted-average discount rate at contract issue date used to measure liability for future policy benefit.

column1: Liability, Premium Deficiency Testing on Long-Duration Contract, Amount
column2: Amount of liability from premium deficiency and loss recognition testing on long-duration contract issued by insurance entity. Excludes closed block.

column1: Liability, Premium Deficiency Testing on Long-Duration Contract, Anticipated Investment Income, Amount
column2: Amount of anticipated investment income considered when performing premium deficiency testing on long-duration insurance contract issued by insurance entity.

column1: Market Risk Benefit, Asset, Amount
column2: Amount of asset position for contract or contract feature in long-duration contract issued by insurance entity that both protects contract holder from other-than-nominal capital market risk and exposes insurance entity to other-than-nominal capital market risk.

column1: Market Risk Benefit, Attributed Fee Collected
column2: Amount of cash inflow to contract or contract feature in long-duration contract issued by insurance entity that both protects contract holder from other-than-nominal capital market risk and exposes insurance entity to other-than-nominal capital market risk from attributed fee collected.

column1: Market Risk Benefit, Benefit Payment
column2: Amount of cash outflow to policyholder from benefit payment for contract or contract feature in long-duration contract issued by insurance entity that both protects contract holder from other-than-nominal capital market risk and exposes insurance entity to other-than-nominal capital market risk.

column1: Market Risk Benefit, Issuance
column2: Amount of increase in contract or contract feature in long-duration contract issued by insurance entity that both protects contract holder from other-than-nominal capital market risk and exposes insurance entity to other-than-nominal capital market risk from contract issuance.

column1: Market Risk Benefit, Liability, Amount
column2: Amount of liability position for contract or contract feature in long-duration contract issued by insurance entity that both protects contract holder from other-than-nominal capital market risk and exposes insurance entity to other-than-nominal capital market risk.

column1: Market Risk Benefit, Measurement Input
column2: Value of measurement input used to measure contract or contract feature in long-duration contract issued by insurance entity that both protects contract holder from other-than-nominal capital market risk and exposes insurance entity to other-than-nominal capital market risk.

column1: Market Risk Benefit, Net Amount at Risk
column2: Amount of guaranteed benefit in excess of current account balance of contract or contract feature in long-duration contract issued by insurance entity that both protects contract holder from other-than-nominal capital market risk and exposes insurance entity to other-than-nominal capital market risk.

column1: Market Risk Benefit, Reinsurance Recoverable, after Allowance
column2: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, recoverable under reinsurance for contract or contract feature in long-duration contract issued by insurance entity that both protects contract holder from other-than-nominal capital market risk and exposes insurance entity to other-than-nominal capital market risk.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, 90 Days or More Past Due, Still Accruing
column2: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, 90 days or more past due and still accruing.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss
column2: Amount of allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
column2: Amount of allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, classified as current.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
column2: Amount of allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, classified as noncurrent.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
column2: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, from recovery.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff
column2: Amount of writeoff of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, charged against allowance for credit loss.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Change in Present Value, Interest Income
column2: Amount of interest income on net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, from change in present value of expected cash flows, attributable to passage of time.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Nonaccrual
column2: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, on nonaccrual status.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Nonaccrual, Interest Income
column2: Amount of interest income on nonaccrual net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Nonaccrual, No Allowance
column2: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, on nonaccrual status with no allowance for credit loss.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Not Past Due
column2: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, not past due.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Originated Five or More Years before Latest Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases originated five or more years prior to latest fiscal year.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Originated Four Years before Latest Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases originated four years prior to latest fiscal year.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Originated in Current Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases originated in current fiscal year.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Originated in Fiscal Year before Latest Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases originated in fiscal year prior to latest fiscal year.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Originated Three Years before Latest Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases originated three years prior to latest fiscal year.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Originated Two Years before Latest Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases originated two years prior to latest fiscal year.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Past Due
column2: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, past due.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Purchase
column2: Amount of increase from purchase of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Sale
column2: Amount of decrease from sale of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

column1: Off-Balance Sheet, Credit Loss, Liability
column2: Amount of expected credit loss for credit exposure on off-balance-sheet commitment, including but not limited to, loan commitment, standby letter of credit, financial guarantee not accounted for as insurance. Excludes off-balance sheet credit exposure accounted for as insurance and instrument accounted for under derivatives and hedging.

column1: Policyholder Account Balance, above Guaranteed Minimum Crediting Rate
column2: Value above guaranteed minimum crediting rate on policyholder account balance.

column1: Policyholder Account Balance, Benefit Payment
column2: Amount of cash outflow to policyholder account balance from benefit payment.

column1: Policyholder Account Balance, Guaranteed Minimum Credit Rating
column2: Guaranteed minimum crediting rate on policyholder account balance.

column1: Policyholder Account Balance, Issuance
