column2: Amount of increase in liability for policyholder account balance from contract issuance.

column1: Policyholder Account Balance, Net Amount at Risk
column2: Amount of guaranteed benefit in excess of current account balance of policyholder account balance.

column1: Policyholder Account Balance, Policy Charge
column2: Amount of decrease in liability for policyholder account balance from policy charge.

column1: Policyholder Account Balance, Premium Received
column2: Amount of cash inflow to policyholder account balance from premium received.

column1: Policyholder Account Balance, Surrender
column2: Amount of decrease in liability for policyholder account balance from contract redemption.

column1: Policyholder Account Balance, Surrender and Withdrawal
column2: Amount of decrease in liability for policyholder account balance from contract redemption and withdrawal of funds.

column1: Policyholder Account Balance, Weighted Average Crediting Rate
column2: Weighted-average crediting rate for liability for policyholder account balance, calculated at a point in time.

column1: Policyholder Account Balance, Withdrawal
column2: Amount of decrease in liability for policyholder account balance from withdrawal of funds.

column1: Premium Deficiency Testing Expense, Long-Duration Contract, Amount
column2: Amount of expense for premium deficiency and loss recognition testing on long-duration contract issued by insurance entity. Excludes closed block.

column1: Present Value of Future Insurance Profit, Experience Adjustment
column2: Amount of expense for writeoff from unexpected insurance contract termination, charged against previously capitalized present value of future profit of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

column1: Proceeds, Accounts Receivable, Previously Written Off, Recovery
column2: Amount of cash inflow from recovery of accounts receivable previously written off.

column1: Proceeds, Contract with Customer, Asset, Previously Written Off, Recovery
column2: Amount of cash inflow from recovery of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, previously written off.

column1: Proceeds, Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Previously Written Off, Recovery
column2: Amount of cash inflow from recovery of net investment in direct financing lease, previously written off.

column1: Proceeds, Net Investment in Lease, Previously Written Off, Recovery
column2: Amount of cash inflow from recovery of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, previously written off.

column1: Proceeds, Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Previously Written Off, Recovery
column2: Amount of cash inflow from recovery of net investment in sales-type lease, previously written off.

column1: Reinsurance Recoverable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
column2: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on reinsurance recoverable, from recovery.

column1: Reinsurance Recoverable, Not Past Due
column2: Amount of reinsurance recoverable, not past due.

column1: Reinsurance Recoverable, Past Due
column2: Amount of reinsurance recoverable past due.

column1: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, 90 Days or More Past Due, Still Accruing
column2: Amount of net investment in sales-type lease, 90 days or more past due and still accruing.

column1: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss
column2: Amount of allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type lease.

column1: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
column2: Amount of allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type lease, classified as current.

column1: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
column2: Amount of allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type lease, classified as noncurrent.

column1: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
column2: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type lease, from recovery.

column1: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff
column2: Amount of writeoff of net investment in sales-type lease, charged against allowance for credit loss.

column1: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Change in Present Value, Interest Income

column1: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Nonaccrual

column1: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Nonaccrual, No Allowance
column2: Amount of net investment in sales-type lease on nonaccrual status with no allowance for credit loss.

column1: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Not Past Due
column2: Amount of net investment in sales-type lease, not past due.

column2: Amount of net investment in sales-type lease originated five or more years prior to latest fiscal year.

column1: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Originated Four Years before Latest Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of net investment in sales-type lease originated four years prior to latest fiscal year.

column1: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Originated in Current Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of net investment in sales-type lease originated in current fiscal year.

column1: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Originated in Fiscal Year before Latest Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of net investment in sales-type lease originated in fiscal year prior to latest fiscal year.

column1: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Originated Three Years before Latest Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of net investment in sales-type lease originated three years prior to latest fiscal year.

column1: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Originated Two Years before Latest Fiscal Year
column2: Amount of net investment in sales-type lease originated two years prior to latest fiscal year.

column1: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Past Due
column2: Amount of net investment in sales-type lease, past due.

column1: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Purchase
column2: Amount of increase from purchase of net investment in sales-type lease.

column1: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Sale
column2: Amount of decrease from sale of net investment in sales-type lease.

column1: Securities Borrowed, Allowance for Credit Loss
column2: Amount of allowance for credit loss on security borrowed.

column1: Securities Borrowed, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
column2: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on security borrowed, from recovery.

column1: Securities Borrowed, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff
column2: Amount of writeoff of security borrowed, charged against allowance for credit loss.

column1: Securities Borrowed, Decrease

column1: Securities Borrowed, Increase
column2: Amount of increase in security borrowed from entering into new transaction.

column1: Securities Purchased under Agreement to Resell, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff
column2: Amount of writeoff of security purchased under agreement to resell, charged against allowance for credit loss.

column1: Securities Purchased under Agreements to Resell, Allowance for Credit Loss
column2: Amount of allowance for credit loss on security purchased under agreement to resell.

column2: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on security purchased under agreement to resell, from recovery.

column2: Amount of decrease from sale of security purchased under agreement to resell.

column1: Separate Account, Liability, Benefit Payment

column1: Separate Account, Liability, Cash Surrender Value, Amount

column1: Separate Account, Liability, Deposit
column2: Amount of cash inflow to separate account liability for cash received for deposit.

column1: Separate Account, Liability, Policy Charge
column2: Amount of decrease in separate account liability from policy charge.

column1: Separate Account, Liability, Premium
column2: Amount of cash inflow to separate account liability from premium collected from policyholder.

column1: Separate Account, Liability, Premium and Deposit
column2: Amount of cash inflow to separate account liability from premium and deposit from cash received.

column1: Separate Account, Liability, Surrender
column2: Amount of decrease in separate account liability from contract redemption.

column1: Separate Account, Liability, Surrender and Withdrawal
column2: Amount of decrease in separate account liability from contract redemption and withdrawal of funds.

column1: Separate Account, Liability, Withdrawal
column2: Amount of decrease in liability for separate account from withdrawal of funds.

column1: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Decrease in Deferred Tax Liability due to Transition Tax
column2: Amount of decrease in deferred tax liability previously recognized attributable to taxable temporary differences from undistributed earnings of foreign subsidiary and other recognized entity now subject to transition tax.

column1: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Incomplete Accounting, Deferred Tax Liabilities, Provisional Undistributed Foreign Earnings
column2: Amount of reasonable estimate for deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from undistributed earnings of subsidiary and other recognized entity not within country of domicile. Includes, but is not limited to, other basis differences.

column1: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Incomplete Accounting, Transition Tax for Accumulated Foreign Earnings, Provisional Liability
column2: Amount of reasonable estimate for tax liability for which accounting for tax effect from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

column1: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Incomplete Accounting, Transition Tax for Accumulated Foreign Earnings, Provisional Liability, Current
column2: Amount of reasonable estimate for tax liability for which accounting for tax effect from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, classified as current.

column1: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Incomplete Accounting, Transition Tax for Accumulated Foreign Earnings, Provisional Liability, Noncurrent
column2: Amount of reasonable estimate for tax liability for which accounting for tax effect from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, classified as noncurrent.

column1: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Incomplete Accounting, Undistributed Accumulated Earnings of Foreign Subsidiary, Existing Unrecognized Deferred Tax Liability
column2: Amount of deferred tax liability not recognized on undistributed accumulated earnings of foreign subsidiary and intended to be permanently reinvested outside country of domicile for which accounting for tax effect is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act and no reasonable estimate is determined.

column1: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Incomplete Accounting, Undistributed Accumulated Earnings of Foreign Subsidiary, Provisional Unrecognized Deferred Tax Liability
column2: Amount of reasonable estimate for deferred tax liability not recognized for temporary differences related to foreign subsidiary and intended to be permanently reinvested outside country of domicile for which accounting for tax effect is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act. Temporary differences include, but are not limited to, undistributed earnings of foreign subsidiary not subject to transition tax and other basis difference.

column1: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Transition Tax for Accumulated Foreign Earnings, Liability
column2: Amount of tax liability from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

column1: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Transition Tax for Accumulated Foreign Earnings, Liability, Current
column2: Amount of tax liability from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, classified as current.

column1: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Transition Tax for Accumulated Foreign Earnings, Liability, Noncurrent
column2: Amount of tax liability from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, classified as noncurrent.

column1: Accounts Receivable, Noncurrent, Accrued Interest, after Allowance for Credit Loss
column2: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accrued interest on accounts receivable classified as noncurrent.

column1: Banking Regulation, Capital Conservation Buffer, Capital Conserved, Minimum
column2: Minimum capital conservation buffer percentage required to avoid restriction on payout amount of eligible retained income as defined by regulatory framework.

column1: Banking Regulation, Capital Conservation Buffer, Common Equity Tier One Risk-Based Capital, Actual
column2: Capital conservation buffer percentage calculated as Common Equity Tier 1 risk-based capital ratio after deduction of minimum Common Equity Tier 1 risk-based capital ratio as defined by regulatory framework.

column1: Banking Regulation, Capital Conservation Buffer, Tier One Risk-Based Capital, Actual
column2: Capital conservation buffer percentage calculated as Tier 1 risk-based capital ratio after deduction of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital ratio as defined by regulatory framework.

column1: Banking Regulation, Capital Conservation Buffer, Total Risk-Based Capital, Actual
column2: Capital conservation buffer percentage calculated as total risk-based capital ratio after deduction of minimum total risk-based capital ratio as defined by regulatory framework.

column1: Banking Regulation, Common Equity Tier One Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
column2: Ratio of minimum Common Equity Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

column1: Banking Regulation, Common Equity Tier One Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Significantly Undercapitalized, Minimum
column2: Ratio of minimum Common Equity Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets categorized as significantly undercapitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

column1: Banking Regulation, Common Equity Tier One Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Undercapitalized, Minimum
column2: Ratio of minimum Common Equity Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets categorized as undercapitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

column1: Banking Regulation, Common Equity Tier One Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Well Capitalized, Minimum
column2: Ratio of minimum Common Equity Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

column1: Banking Regulation, Countercyclical Capital Buffer
column2: Countercyclical capital buffer percentage as defined by regulatory framework.

column1: Banking Regulation, Global Systemically Important Bank (GSIB) Surcharge
column2: Global systemically important bank (GSIB) surcharge percentage as defined by regulatory framework.

column1: Banking Regulation, Leverage Buffer, Actual
column2: Leverage buffer percentage as defined by regulatory framework.

column1: Banking Regulation, Leverage Buffer, Minimum
column2: Minimum leverage buffer percentage as defined by regulatory framework.

column1: Banking Regulation, Maximum Leverage Payout Amount
column2: Amount of global systemically important bank's (GSIB) eligible retained income multiplied by applicable maximum leverage payout ratio as defined by regulatory framework.

column1: Banking Regulation, Maximum Leverage Payout Ratio
column2: Maximum percentage of eligible retained income that can be paid out in distribution and discretionary bonus payment by global systemically important bank (GSIB) as defined by regulatory framework.

column1: Banking Regulation, Maximum Payout Amount
column2: Amount of eligible retained income multiplied by applicable maximum payout ratio as defined by regulatory framework.

column1: Banking Regulation, Maximum Payout Ratio
column2: Maximum percentage of eligible retained income that can be paid out in distribution and discretionary bonus payment as defined by regulatory framework.

column1: Banking Regulation, Supplementary Leverage Ratio, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
column2: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital to total leverage exposure required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

column1: Banking Regulation, Supplementary Leverage Ratio, Undercapitalized, Minimum
column2: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital to total leverage exposure categorized as undercapitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

column1: Banking Regulation, Supplementary Leverage Ratio, Well Capitalized, Minimum
column2: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital to total leverage exposure categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

column1: Banking Regulation, Tangible Equity Ratio, Actual
column2: Ratio of tangible equity to total assets as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

column1: Banking Regulation, Tangible Equity Ratio, Critically Undercapitalized, Maximum
column2: Ratio of maximum tangible equity to total assets categorized as critically undercapitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

column1: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital Ratio, Significantly Undercapitalized, Minimum
column2: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital to average assets categorized as significantly undercapitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

column1: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital Ratio, Undercapitalized, Minimum
column2: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital to average assets categorized as undercapitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

column1: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Significantly Undercapitalized, Minimum
column2: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets categorized as significantly undercapitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

column1: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Undercapitalized, Minimum
column2: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets categorized as undercapitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

column1: Banking Regulation, Total Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Significantly Undercapitalized, Minimum
column2: Ratio of minimum total risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets categorized as significantly undercapitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

column1: Banking Regulation, Total Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Undercapitalized, Minimum
column2: Ratio of minimum total risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets categorized as undercapitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

column2: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional, classified as noncurrent.

column2: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accrued interest on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

column1: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Adjustable Interest Rate, Maturity, Rolling after One Year
column2: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable with adjustable interest rate, maturing after next rolling fiscal year following current statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach.

column1: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Maturity, after Year Fifteen
column2: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable maturing after fifteenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

column1: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Maturity, after Year Five though Fifteen
column2: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable maturing in sixth through fifteenth fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

column1: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Maturity, after Year One Through Five
column2: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable maturing in second through fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

column1: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Maturity, Rolling after Year 15
column2: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable, maturing after fifteenth rolling fiscal year following current statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach.

column1: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Maturity, Rolling after Year Five though Fifteen Years
column2: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable, maturing in sixth through fifteenth rolling fiscal year following current statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach.

column1: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Maturity, Rolling after Year One Through Five Years
column2: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable, maturing in second through fifth rolling fiscal year following current statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach.

column1: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Maturity, Rolling within One Year
column2: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable, maturing in next rolling fiscal year following current statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach.

column1: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Maturity, Year One
column2: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

column1: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Predetermined Interest Rate, Maturity, after Year One
column2: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable with predetermined interest rate, maturing after next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes floating and adjustable rates and interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

column1: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Predetermined Interest Rate, Maturity, Rolling after One Year
column2: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable with predetermined interest rate, maturing after next rolling fiscal year following current statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach. Excludes floating and adjustable rates.

column1: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss, to Total, Percent
column2: Percentage, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable to total financing receivable.

column1: Financing Receivable, Excluding Accrued Interest, after Allowance for Credit Loss
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable.

column1: Financing Receivable, Excluding Accrued Interest, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable classified as current.

column1: Financing Receivable, Excluding Accrued Interest, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable classified as noncurrent.

column1: Financing Receivable, Excluding Accrued Interest, before Allowance for Credit Loss
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable.

column1: Financing Receivable, Excluding Accrued Interest, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable classified as current.

column1: Financing Receivable, Excluding Accrued Interest, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable classified as noncurrent.

column1: Financing Receivable, Excluding Accrued Interest, Originated, More than Five Years before Current Fiscal Year
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest of financing receivable originated more than five years prior to current fiscal year.

column1: Financing Receivable, Excluding Accrued Interest, Revolving
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest of financing receivable that can be withdrawn, repaid, and redrawn.

column1: Financing Receivable, Excluding Accrued Interest, Revolving, Converted to Term Loan
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest of revolving financing receivable converted to term loan.

column1: Financing Receivable, Excluding Accrued Interest, Year Five, Originated, Four Years before Current Fiscal Year
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest of financing receivable originated four years prior to current fiscal year.

column1: Financing Receivable, Excluding Accrued Interest, Year Four, Originated, Three Years before Current Fiscal Year
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest of financing receivable originated three years prior to current fiscal year.

column1: Financing Receivable, Excluding Accrued Interest, Year One, Originated, Current Fiscal Year
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest of financing receivable originated in current fiscal year.

column1: Financing Receivable, Excluding Accrued Interest, Year Three, Originated, Two Years before Current Fiscal Year
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest of financing receivable originated two years prior to current fiscal year.

column1: Financing Receivable, Excluding Accrued Interest, Year Two, Originated, Fiscal Year before Current Fiscal Year
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest of financing receivable originated in fiscal year prior to current fiscal year.

column1: Financing Receivable, Nonaccrual to Outstanding, Percent
column2: Percentage of nonaccrual to total financing receivable outstanding.

column1: Financing Receivables, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Average Amount Outstanding
column2: Average amount outstanding, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivables.

column1: Financing Receivable, Writeoff after Recovery to Average Outstanding, Percent
column2: Percentage of writeoff after recovery to average financing receivables outstanding.

column1: Forward Contract Indexed to Equity, Settlement, Cash, Effect of Change in Fair Value of Share
column2: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash that would be paid upon settlement from change in fair value of share for forward contract indexed to equity.

column1: Forward Contract Indexed to Equity, Settlement, Number of Shares, Effect of Change in Fair Value of Share
column2: Increase (decrease) in number of shares that would be issued upon settlement from change in fair value of share for forward contract indexed to equity.

column1: Forward Contract Indexed to Equity, Settlement, Share, Fair Value
column2: Fair value of shares that would be issued upon settlement of forward contract indexed to equity.

column1: Forward Contract Indexed to Equity, Settlement, Share, Fair Value Per Share
column2: Fair value per share that would be issued upon settlement of forward contract indexed to equity.

column1: Health Care Organization, Accounts Payable to Third-Party Payor
column2: Amount payable to third-party payor by health care organization for contractual adjustment and final settlement.

column1: Impairment, Excluding Lessor Asset under Operating Lease
column2: Amount, excluding lessor's underlying asset for which right to use has been conveyed to lessee under operating lease, of impairment for long-lived asset held for use.

column1: Impairment, Lessor Asset under Operating Lease
column2: Amount of impairment for lessor's underlying asset for which right to use has been conveyed to lessee under operating lease.

column1: Interest-Bearing Liabilities, Average Amount Outstanding
column2: Average amount outstanding of interest-bearing liabilities.

column1: Interest-Earning Assets, Average Amount Outstanding
column2: Average amount outstanding of interest-earning assets.

column1: Interest-Earning Deposits in Banks, Average Amount Outstanding
column2: Average amount outstanding of interest-earning deposits in banks.

column1: Interest Expense, Interest-Bearing Liability
column2: Amount of interest expense on interest-bearing liability.

column1: Interest Income, Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss
column2: Amount of interest income from financing receivable before allowance for credit loss.

column1: Interest Income, Interest-Earning Asset
column2: Amount of interest income from interest-earning asset.

column1: Interest Income, Short-Term Investment, Other
column2: Amount of interest income from short-term investment classified as other.

column1: Liabilities and Stockholders' Equity, Average Amount Outstanding
column2: Average amount outstanding of interest-bearing and noninterest-bearing liabilities and stockholders' equity.

column1: Liabilities, Average Amount Outstanding
column2: Average amount outstanding of interest-bearing and noninterest-bearing liabilities.

column1: Long-Term Debt, Average Amount Outstanding
column2: Average amount outstanding of long-term debt.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, after Allowance for Credit Loss
column2: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
column2: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, classified as current.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
column2: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, classified as noncurrent.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss, Excluding Accrued Interest
column2: Amount, excluding accrued interest, of allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss, Excluding Accrued Interest, Current
column2: Amount, excluding accrued interest, of allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, classified as current.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss, Excluding Accrued Interest, Noncurrent
column2: Amount, excluding accrued interest, of allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, classified as noncurrent.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Excluding Accrued Interest, after Allowance for Credit Loss
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Excluding Accrued Interest, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, classified as current.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Excluding Accrued Interest, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, classified as noncurrent.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Excluding Accrued Interest, before Allowance for Credit Loss
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Excluding Accrued Interest, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, classified as current.

column1: Net Investment in Lease, Excluding Accrued Interest, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, classified as noncurrent.

column1: Noninterest-Earning Assets, Average Amount Outstanding
column2: Average amount outstanding of noninterest-earning assets.

column1: Noninterest-Earning Liabilities, Average Amount Outstanding
column2: Average amount outstanding of noninterest-bearing liabilities.

column1: Nontaxable Investment Securities, Average Amount Outstanding
column2: Average amount outstanding of nontaxable investment securities.

column1: Option Contract Indexed to Equity, Settlement, Cash, Effect of Change in Fair Value of Share
column2: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash that would be paid upon settlement from change in fair value of share for option contract indexed to equity.

column1: Option Contract Indexed to Equity, Settlement, Number of Shares, Effect of Change in Fair Value of Share
column2: Increase (decrease) in number of shares that would be issued upon settlement from change in fair value of share for option contract indexed to equity.

column1: Option Contract Indexed to Equity, Settlement, Share, Fair Value
column2: Fair value of shares that would be issued upon settlement of option contract indexed to equity.

column1: Option Contract Indexed to Equity, Settlement, Share, Fair Value Per Share
column2: Fair value per share that would be issued upon settlement of option contract indexed to equity.

column1: Payments to Acquire Equity Securities, FV-NI
column2: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI), classified as investing activity.

column1: Preferred Stock, Convertible, Conversion Price
column2: Per share conversion price of preferred stock.

column1: Preferred Stock, Convertible, Conversion Ratio
column2: Number of common shares issuable upon conversion for each share of preferred stock to be converted.

column1: Preferred Stock, Convertible, Shares Issuable
column2: Number of common shares issuable upon conversion of preferred stock.

column1: Proceeds from Sale of Equity Securities, FV-NI
column2: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI), classified as investing activity.

column1: Property, Plant, and Equipment, Excluding Lessor Asset under Operating Lease, Accumulated Depreciation
column2: Amount, excluding lessor's underlying asset for which right to use has been conveyed to lessee under operating lease, of accumulated amortization, depreciation, depletion for physical asset used in normal conduct of business to create and distribute product and service.

column1: Property, Plant, and Equipment, Excluding Lessor Asset under Operating Lease, after Accumulated Depreciation
column2: Amount, after accumulated depreciation and excluding lessor's underlying asset for which right to use has been conveyed to lessee under operating lease, of physical asset used in normal conduct of business to create and distribute product and service.

column1: Property, Plant, and Equipment, Excluding Lessor Asset under Operating Lease, before Accumulated Depreciation
column2: Amount, before accumulated depreciation and excluding lessor's underlying asset for which right to use has been conveyed to lessee under operating lease, of physical asset used in normal conduct of business to create and distribute product and service.

column1: Sales-Type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, after Allowance for Credit Loss
column2: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type lease.

column1: Sales-Type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
column2: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type lease, classified as current.

column1: Sales-Type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
column2: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type lease, classified as noncurrent.

column1: Sales-Type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss, Excluding Accrued Interest
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest, of allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type lease.

column1: Sales-Type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss, Excluding Accrued Interest, Current
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest, of allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type lease, classified as current.

column1: Sales-Type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss, Excluding Accrued Interest, Noncurrent
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest, of allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type lease, classified as noncurrent.

column1: Sales-Type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
column2: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type lease, classified as current.

column1: Sales-Type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
column2: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type lease, classified as noncurrent.

column1: Sales-Type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Excluding Accrued Interest, after Allowance for Credit Loss
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type lease.

column1: Sales-Type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Excluding Accrued Interest, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type lease, classified as current.

column1: Sales-Type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Excluding Accrued Interest, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type lease, classified as noncurrent.

column1: Sales-Type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Excluding Accrued Interest, before Allowance for Credit Loss
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type lease.

column1: Sales-Type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Excluding Accrued Interest, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type lease, classified as current.

column1: Sales-Type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Excluding Accrued Interest, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
column2: Amount excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type lease, classified as noncurrent.

column1: Savings Deposit Liabilities, Average Amount Outstanding
column2: Average amount outstanding of savings deposits.

column1: Short-Term Investments, Other, Average Amount Outstanding
column2: Average amount outstanding of short-term investments classified as other.

column1: Stockholders' Equity, Average Amount Outstanding
column2: Average amount outstanding of stockholders' equity.

column1: Taxable Investment Securities, Average Amount Outstanding
column2: Average amount outstanding of taxable investment securities.

column1: Time Deposit Liability, above US Insurance Limit
column2: Amount of uninsured time deposit liability in excess of Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) insurance limit or similar state deposit insurance regime in United States of America (US). Excludes time deposit that is otherwise uninsured.

column1: Time Deposit Liability, above US Insurance Limit, Maturity, over 12 Months
column2: Amount of uninsured time deposit liability in excess of Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) insurance limit or similar state deposit insurance regime in United States of America (US), with time remaining to mature over 12 months. Excludes time deposit that is otherwise uninsured.

column1: Time Deposit Liability, above US Insurance Limit, Maturity, over Six Months through Twelve Months
column2: Amount of uninsured time deposit liability in excess of Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) insurance limit or similar state deposit insurance regime in United States of America (US), with time remaining to mature over six through twelve months. Excludes time deposit that is otherwise uninsured.

column1: Time Deposit Liability, above US Insurance Limit, Maturity, over Three Months through Six Months
column2: Amount of uninsured time deposit liability in excess of Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) insurance limit or similar state deposit insurance regime in United States of America (US), with time remaining to mature over three through six months. Excludes time deposit that is otherwise uninsured.

column1: Time Deposit Liability, above US Insurance Limit, Maturity, Three Months or Less
column2: Amount of uninsured time deposit liability in excess of Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) insurance limit or similar state deposit insurance regime in United States of America (US), with time remaining to mature in three months or less. Excludes time deposit that is otherwise uninsured.

column1: Time Deposit Liability, Uninsured
column2: Amount of uninsured time deposit liability. Excludes uninsured time deposit liability in excess of Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) insurance limit or similar state deposit insurance regime in United States of America (US).

column1: Time Deposit Liability, Uninsured, Maturity, over Six Months through Twelve Months
column2: Amount of uninsured time deposit liability with time remaining to mature over six through twelve months. Excludes uninsured time deposit liability in excess of Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) insurance limit or similar state deposit insurance regime in United States of America (US).

column1: Time Deposit Liability, Uninsured, Maturity, over Three Months through Six Months
column2: Amount of uninsured time deposit liability with time remaining to mature over three through six months. Excludes uninsured time deposit liability in excess of Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) insurance limit or similar state deposit insurance regime in United States of America (US).

column1: Time Deposit Liability, Uninsured, Maturity, over Twelve Months
column2: Amount of uninsured time deposit liability with time remaining to mature over 12 months. Excludes uninsured time deposit liability in excess of Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) insurance limit or similar state deposit insurance regime in United States of America (US).

column1: Time Deposit Liability, Uninsured, Maturity, Three Months or Less
column2: Amount of uninsured time deposit liability with time remaining to mature in three months or less. Excludes uninsured time deposit liability in excess of Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) insurance limit or similar state deposit insurance regime in United States of America (US).

column1: Time Deposits Liabilities, Average Amount Outstanding
column2: Average amount outstanding of time deposits.
